mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (user_id, product_id, quantity, created_at, product_size_id) VALUE(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, NOW(), #{productSizeId})
mapper.select: select c.cart_id, c.user_id, c.product_id, c.quantity, c.created_at, ps.size_code, ps.stock, p.product_name, p.description, p.price, p.discounted_price, p.image_url from CART c JOIN PRODUCT p on c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN PRODUCT_SIZE ps on c.product_size_id = ps.product_size_id where c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at desc
